He will use this loan to buy up-to-date materials for making women's dresses and men's suits. He dreams of increasing his tailoring business.  

Said will make sure that his loan is paid according to the loan schedule.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date materials for making women's dresses and men's suits.

loans.name: Fanaka Kajiungeni Group

texts.en:
FADHILA, who is in her late 20s is single with four children (two pairs of twins) who are still in school.  She has been running a beauty salon for three years now.  She works from 08 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be FADHILA's 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loan to buy salon products and has repaid her loan successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees and covered household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy good quality salon product that meet her customer's  requirements.  She dreams of building her own house

FADHILA will share this loan with her loan group "Fanaka Kajiungeni", which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy good quality salon products that meet her customer's requirements.

loans.name: Kisoga Group

texts.en:
Tekla, who is in her early 30s, is single with two children. One of them is in school and the other one is still small. She has been a food vendor for three years now. She works from 6am to 10pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Tekla's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use this loan to buy food ingredients.  She dreams of owning a Hotel.

Tekla will share this loan with her loan group "KISOGA" which consists of four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Chanika One Chanika Group

texts.en:
Adam, who is in his early 50s, is a divorcee with two children; both of them are grown up. He has been running a genge (grocery) business for four years now.  He works from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be Adam's seventh loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to keep on increasing the stock in his genge and has managed to pay back all his loans successfully. He is doing great with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support. He used the profit to pay school fees until his children finished school. He also bought a plot of land and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to buy the out-of-stock items in his genge.  He dreams of owning a cosmetics shop.

Adam will share this loan with his loan group, "Chanika One Chanika," which consists of seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy the out-of-stock items in his genge (grocery business).

loans.name: Steven

texts.en:
Steven is a 57-year-old man who is married with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He buys and sells cocoa to earn a living for his family. He gets money from this business to look after his children, especially paying school fees for all his children who are in school. Inadequate capital and seasonality are his major challenges. 

He wants a loan to buy cocoa and rent cocoa gardens to harvest and sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa and rent cocoa gardens to harvest and sell.

loans.name: Raziya

texts.ru: Разия, 36 лет, замужем, 3 детей. У Разии высшее педагогическое образование. Также в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается сельским хозяйством. У Разии в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 3 овцы. На земельном участке мерою 0,40 ГА она выращивает картофель и клевер, также черешню. Всю продукцию реализует оптовым покупателям. Разия известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Разия обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 бычков. Доходы от кредита Разия планирует использовать для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Razia is 36 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a degree in education.  She also works in agriculture to provide an extra income for her family.  She currently owns two cows and three sheep.  In addition, she owns 0.4 hectare of land on which she grows potatoes and clover, and she also has some cherry trees.  She sells her entire crop production to bulk buyers.  Razia is known as a principled, honest, decent and trustworthy person.  She currently makes a monthly income of 25,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to buy two young bulls.  She plans to re-invest the earnings from her loan into further increasing her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase two young bulls for fattening and resale, in order to expand her livestock business.

loans.name: Mpunga Group

texts.en:
Hadija, who is in her mid 40s, is single with six children who are still in school.  She has been running a genge-duka (shop) for one and a half year now.  She works from 05am to 06 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Hadija's 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to restock the missing items in her genge (fruit & vegetable stall) and opened the shop to make a genge-duka. She is doing fine. She used the profit to pay school fees and covered household expenses.  

She will use this loan to buy the fast turnover items in her gengeduka.  She dreams of buying a car to be able to move her products from the market to her shop.

Hadija will share this loan with her loan group "MPUNGA" which has two members who wil hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy fast turnover items for her gengeduka.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie, 43, lives in Molave, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married and was gifted with two children. Elsie and her husband are both farmers; they raised their family doing this type of activity. This industrious member finds herself plowing the rice field, planting vegetables and other varieties of agricultural commodities to continue putting bread on the table in their home. 

In need of additional working capital, Elsie decided to join Paglaum Cooperative. She has received several loans already and recently requested 25,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to pay for labor costs and land preparation on her rice farm and to buy fertilizer and herbicides to increase crop yield.

Being a MIGS member (Member in Good Standing) of the cooperative, she has been able to manage her income. She is able to provide for the daily needs of her family. Elsie is very thankful because if it were not for Paglaum, she might not have any savings at all, nor be guided properly in her finances. She hopes to own a land tractor someday for fast and easy farm work.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs and land preparation on her rice farm and buy fertilizer and herbicides to increase crop yield

loans.name: Lita

texts.en: Lita is a strong-willed woman who pushes her ability when it comes to her piggery business. Recently, she availed herself of a loan to purchase three piglets and one sack of feed with the amount borrowed of 5,000 PHP (Philippines pesos). Someday she hopes to have a wider space for her hog-raising business.

loans.use: To purchase three piglets and one sack of feed

location.town: Oroquieta-Lower Lamac, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occ

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives. As a farmer in Villaflor, Oroquieta, Philippines, she has a wide rice field to sustain their needs. Luzminda feels she owes her good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used for her business. 

Recently, she availed herself of a loan to  purchase two sacks of fertilizer and two bottles of chemicals for the rice field. Luzminda wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply rice in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: To purchase two sacks of fertilizer and two bottles of chemicals for the rice field production

loans.name: Abenia

texts.en:
Abenia has mastered managing her rice production business in Molave, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. This is how she makes a living and is able to support her family. 

She was at her lowest point when she didn't have enough capital for her business. When she joined PMPC, she was truly grateful to avail herself of credit to fully support her business. Just as she takes care of her rice production business, so it is with her membership with PMPC. She wants to maintain her membership in good standing so she can always fulfill any financing needs. Now, on her 8th loan cycle, she borrowed an amount of PHP 30,000. It will be used to buy bags of fertilizer and chemicals, which will allow her to maximize her profit. 

In the future, by setting aside savings from her sales, Abenia hopes to buy a parcel of rice land to expand her rice production.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer and chemicals to increase crop yields on her rice farm.

loans.name: Gil

texts.en:
Gil has the skills and expertise in "balut" making, only he had no capital to start the business. As a father from Molave, Zamboanga del Norte, he never gets tired of supporting his family in any way he could, as long as he earned an income. He joined PMPC after he learned he could avail himself of financial assistance. He decided to venture into a "balut" vending business. It has been doing well when he doubles his time perfecting the taste of his "balut." 

He has maximized his profits and keeps pursuing his goals for the good of his family. The reason why he availed himself of another loan from PMPC was to restock inventories of eggs for "balut" making to increase sales and production, and able to supply stock as well. He hopes and prays that his business will grow and benefit his family. 

Today, Gil is able to help others doing retailing business on his "balut," and they, as well, earned for their own families.

loans.use: to restock inventories of eggs for "balut" making to increase sales and production

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa makes a living through her buying and selling business. She runs a coco lumber and timber business in Binuangan, Oroquieta City, and earns a promising income to support her family. She has signed up for membership with PMPC to gain access of capitalization. She wants to increase her inventory. 

Now, she availed herself of a loan to purchase of coconut trees and round logs for lumber. Elsa hopes to sustain her business and dreams to send all her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase coconut trees and round logs for lumber

loans.name: Donozio

texts.en: Donozio, who lives in Kasese, Uganda, used the previous loan to pay for farm inputs like manure for his banana plantation. He is grateful for the support because the situation was solved and now his agriculture products are doing well. He has a dream of buying a vehicle for transporting his farm products to the market for sale. Donozio is faced with the challenges of high costs of transport and weather changes. Donozio wants money to buy fertilizers and manure, and pay for labour.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure, and pay for labour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Roset

texts.en:
Roset is twenty-four years old and married with three children. She lives in Kasese Uganda. 

Roset runs a retail shop with general merchandise alongside second-hand clothes to supplement her husband's salary. She began the business in order to join hands with her husband to support their daily family needs. Roset is hardworking but is faced with the challenge of limited capital. She wants money to buy a refrigerator to meet customer demand for cold drinks.

Roset dreams of buying some land and expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for her business

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is twenty-seven years old, female and marred with one child. She lives in Kasese Uganda. 

Gloria has owned a textile shop selling new clothes for one year now. She started the business to empower herself financially. She dreams of expanding her business despite the problem of inadequate capital. 

Gloria wants money to buy ladies clothes to sell ahead of the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy ladies clothes to sell ahead of the Christmas season.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a 40-year-old married man with 5 children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

Richard is a retailer and at the same time a farmer. He faces the challenge of limited capital, but nevertheless hopes to expand his business to new areas. 

Richard needs a loan to buy sodas, beers and general merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy sodas, beers and general merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Magda

texts.es:
La socia Magda  pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Unidas”, la socia tiene 41 años de edad es soltera y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboración de chicha, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de maíz entre otros.
 La socia Magda está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Magda belongs to the communal bank 'Mujeres Unidas' (Women United).  She is 41 and single with three children.  

She alternates her daily routine with her business of making 'chicha', a sweet drink made from purple corn.  She has been doing this activity for a good while now and it is quite successful thanks to the hard work that she puts into it every day.  She would like to continue to work in this way so she can support her family.  

She is asking for a loan to buy corn among other things.  She is happy with the loans and promises to pay meet the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn among other things.

loans.name: Luz Eli

texts.es:
La socia Luz Eli pertenece al banco comunal “Mujeres Unidas”, la socia tiene 22años de edad es soltera y tiene 01 hijo, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de llamadas telefónicas como locales y nacionales, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de un equipo de celular.
 La socia Luz Eli  está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Luz Eli is a member of the communal bank 'Mujeres Unidas' (Women United).  She is 22 and is single with one child.  

She combines her daily routine with her telephone business.  She makes both international and national calls.  She has been doing this activity for a good while and she is doing well thanks to her hard work every day.

She would like to continue with this work so she can look after her family.  

She is asking for a loan to buy a cellular phone.  She is very happy with the loans and promises to pay the installments on time.

loans.use: to buy a cellular phone.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a 31-year-old married man with 3 children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda.

Francis is a farmer and at the same time runs a bar. He faces the challenges of limited capital and seasonal changes, but nevertheless he hopes to have and plant a personal tea plantation. 

Francis needs a loan to rent a tea plantation in order to harvest tea to sell.

loans.use: to rent a tea plantation and harvest tea to sell.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is a fifty-one-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese Uganda. 

Vincent sells crude salt and also has a salt pan. He also does fishing and is a taxi driver to get additional income. He faces the challenge of weather changes. He has been doing business for twenty-six years and dreams of educating his children and becoming rich. 

Vincent wants money to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food for her children.

loans.name: Wilberforce

texts.en:
Wilberforce is aged thirty-five and is married with one child. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. He is also a teacher by profession and has been in service for two years. He likes his profession. He also operates a general merchandise retail shop to get additional income. 

Wilberforce is requesting a loan facility to buy land to settle on with his family. He dreams of having an improved standard of living.

He is an honest person faced with the challenge of low income.

loans.use: to buy land to settle on with his family

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity is a twenty-seven-year-old single man with no children who lives in Kasese, Uganda. 

He is a teacher by profession and has been in this service for four years. He was inspired by others to join the profession. He also owns a motorcycle transport business to get additional income. He is faced with the challenge of long distances between home and his workplace. He dreams of starting a bigger business that generates daily income. 

Charity wants money to buy cement and sand for the construction of his house.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to construct his house

loans.name: Brisas Del Cielo Group

texts.es: Brisas del cielo es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres laboriosas, que desean seguir superándose y solicitan por primera vez el financiamiento de la institución para sus negocios. Lo coordina la señora Silvia, quien tiene la edad de 42 años y casada, se dedica a la venta de churros y refresco en su domicilio, este negocio fue heredado por su mamá hace quince años y el crédito lo solicita para la compra de churros ya elaborados, linaza, papaya, banano, naranjas, azúcar, bolsas, etc., una de sus metas es pagar las cuotas del crédito en el tiempo establecido para lograr un buen record con la institución. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Luz Amanda, quien tiene la edad de 40 años y se dedica a la comercialización de artesanías en el país de Costa Rica desde hace seis años, y Evelyn de 24 años de edad, comerciante de ropa y bisuterías en su comunidad.
texts.en:
'Brisas del Cielo', is a credit group made up of three hard-working women.  They have a strong desire to progress in life and they are asking for their first loan from this institution to help their businesses.  

Silvia is the coordinator for the group.  She is 42 and is married.  She sells churros and soft drinks from home.  She inherited this business from her mother 15 years ago.  She is asking for a loan to buy ready-made churros, linseed, papaya, bananas, oranges, sugar, bags, etc.  One of her aims is to be able to pay off the installments on time so that they have a good record with the loan organization.  

The other members are Luz Amanda, 40, who deals in crafts in Costa Rica, a business she has had for six years.  Evelyn, 40, sells clothes and costume jewelry in her local community.

loans.use: to buy fruit and churros.

loans.name: Juan Alejandro Lazaro

texts.es:
El lugar donde vive Don Juan es una comunidad muy tranquila, los habitantes son muy amables y muy trabajadores; la mayoría se dedica al comercio de desperdicio industrial como plástico, tinacos para almacenar agua, reciclaje del papel, compra y venta de pinturas, etc. 
A pesar de tener 68 años, Don Juan tiene mucha energía y muy buena salud. Él y su esposa Bertha se casaron hace 49 años y son padres de 12 hijos, todos ellos independientes. 
Don Juan se gana la vida comprando y vendiendo pintura y desperdicios industriales como tambos de plástico y de metal, cartón, etc. Toda su vida se ha dedicado al comercio, pero se acercó a esta línea de negocio al firmar contrato con una fábrica para comprar pintura. Actualmente, él es proveedor de varias ferreterías en su municipio que abastece con su camioneta.
Este es el segundo ciclo y año que trabaja con VisionFund México, está muy agradecido con su préstamo porque pudo invertir en su negocio y tener más mercancía. Además, cuenta que tuvo la posibilidad de comprar dos becerritos que planea vender más adelante. Esta vez quiere invertir el dinero para comprar más pintura de distintos colores.
Don Juan quiere continuar con su negocio y hacerlo crecer a pesar de la competencia pues quiere apoyar a su hijo menor quien ya trabaja pero sueña con regresar a la universidad.

*En la imagen: don Juan en el local donde almacena sus botes de pintura.
texts.en:
Juan lives in a very quiet community where the locals are very friendly and hard-working. They majority of inhabitants here work with industrial waste products, such as plastic, water tanks, paper recycling, and buying and selling paints.

In spite of already being 68 years old, Juan has a lot of energy and is in very good health. He and his wife, Bertha, married 49 years ago and are parents to 12 children, now independent adults.

Juan earns a living buying and selling paints and industrial waste products, such as plastic and metal drums, cardboard and more. All of his life he has supplied various local hardware stores from the back of his truck.

This is Juan's second year and loan cycle with Vision Fund Mexico. He is very grateful for his first loan as he was able to invest it in his business and buy more merchandise.

Juan was also able to buy two calves that he plans to sell in the future. This time, Juan wants to invest this loan in more paint of different colours.

Juan wants to continue with his business and expand it, in spite of the presence of competitors. Juan wants to support his youngest son who, even though he is working, would like to return to university.

*The image is a photograph of Juan in the premises where he stores his paint.

loans.use: to buy cans of paint.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor, es soltero y vive en Santiago junto a su familia. Desde hace muchos años trabaja como Obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola, debido a la necesidad de trabajar porque no había mucha economía en su casa no pudo estudiar la carrera que tanto quería, pero eso fue una motivación para que saliera adelante y deseara un mejor futuro para sus hermanos.
Debido a los fuertes deseos que tiene Rolando de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia va a utilizar el crédito para poder mejorar su vivienda como reforzar y pintarrajear las paredes y cambiar la puerta por una de fierro mucho más segura. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad porque su familia gozará de mayor bienestar y continuará con su labor diaria con mayor tranquilidad,
texts.en:
Rolando is very hard-working and enterprising. He is single and lives in Santiago with his family. For many years, Rolando has worked as a farm labourer. He needs to work because there is not enough money in his home. He was not able to study at university like he had wanted but this motivated him to get ahead so that his siblings can have a better future.

Given Rolando's great desire to improve his family's quality of life, he will use this loan in order to make improvements to his home, including strengthening and daubing the walls, and replacing the door with a stronger iron one. Rolando is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity. With it his family will enjoy better well-being and Juan can continue with his daily work in peace.

loans.use: to replace the door of his house with a more secure metal one.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: Don José Angel viene mejorando su vivienda con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio gracias a su labor que realiza con mucho amor como conductor de transporte escolar, lo que también le permite mantener los estudios y alimentación de sus hijos, hoy en día solicita el crédito para cambiar las laminas de zinc de su casa las cuales ya se encuentran muy viejas y cuando llueve se inunda la vivienda causando incomodidad.
texts.en: Don José Angel is working to improve his home with a lot of effort and sacrifice, thanks to his job as a school transport driver - a job which he performs with a lot of love. His job also allows him to feed his children and send them to school. He is currently requesting a loan in order to replace the zinc laminate roofing of his home, which is very old. This means that his home floods when it rains, causing discomfort.

loans.use: to purchase zinc laminate to replace his roof, in order to avoid flooding in his home.

loans.name: Jose Alexander

texts.es:
Jose es un joven muy emprendedor, centrado en su trabajo y en sacar adelante a su familia, vive en Ica.
Gracias al apoyo de sus padres estudió una carrera profesional y ahora está trabajando en una entidad bancaria de su ciudad, Jose cree que le va bien por su gran esfuerzo, dedicación y porque es muy responsable, honesto y amable con los clientes.
Jose quiere mejorar su calidad de vida es por ello que piensa utilizar el crédito para poder comprar un ropero y así guardar y tener más ordenado su ropa. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, quiere que sepan que con esto sentirá mayor tranquilidad al tener todo en orden y así seguirá luchando para más adelante poder abrir su propio negocio.
texts.en: Jose is a young man full of enterprising spirit. He takes his job and his family's welfare very seriously. He lives in Ica, and thanks to his parents' support, was able to study a career. He now works in a bank in his town. Jose attributes his success to his efforts, his dedication, and the fact that he is responsible, honest, and treats customers with amiability. Jose wants to improve his quality of life and thus asks for a loan in order to buy a wardrobe. He wants it to put his clothes in and keep them more organised. He is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity, and wants them to know that this purchase will help him feel more at home by keeping things organised in his house. He will keep fighting for his goal, which is to start his own business.

loans.use: to buy a wardrobe.

loans.name: Tania De Los Angeles

texts.es:
La joven Tania de los Ángeles, labora como Secretaria en un centro hospitalario de ciudad de León desde hace un año, inicia su jornada de trabajo a las siete de la mañana finalizando a las tres de la tarde de lunes a viernes, ella realiza este trabajo para llevar el sustento a su hogar y de su hijo ya que es madre soltera.

Tania solicito este crédito a Ceprodel para Gastos Médicos (Compra de Lentes), lo cual le permitirá mejorar la salud visual de su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Young Tania de los Ángeles has worked as a secretary in a hospital in the city of León for one year. She begins her working day at seven in the morning and finishes at three in the afternoon, from Monday to Friday. She does this work so that she can support her household and her child, since she is a single mother.

Tania is requesting this loan from Ceprodel for medical expenses. She will purchase glasses for her young son, which will improve his visual health.

loans.use: to purchase glasses for her young child.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the fees to obtain his accountant diploma.

loans.name: Brillantes Rosario Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BRILLANTES ROSARIO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosmery es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de coca a detalle, venta de jugo de quinua, venta de perfumes, venta de refrescos, venta de polleras, venta de helado, venta de fruta.
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosmery es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de frutas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió al observar a sus vecinas la forma de negocio, posteriormente decide emprender el mismo de forma independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de frutas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.
  
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el consultorio, las capacitaciones y el crédito que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen una socia no esta presente por que se encontraba en el consultorio médico.
texts.en: Communal bank Brillantes Rosario is in its first lending cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the focus centre of Senkata. It is comprised of eight members, with Rosmery as president. The members are engaged in various activities, among which: coca retailer, quinoa juice sales, perfume sales, soft drinks sales, skirts sales, ice-cream sales, fruit sales. The loan will benefit small women entrepreneurs. Rosmery says this is her first time working with Pro Mujer and that she joined thanks to a friend who is a client of the institution. Rosmery has her own business: she sells fruit, a trade she learned by observing her neighbours. One day, she took the plunge and decided to start her own business. She needs the loan to increase her working capital by purchasing fruits wholesale from La Paz and selling it at her shop. This is her sole source of income and she uses it to support her family. She has a partner and two children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she mentions the mentoring, training and credit offered by the institution. One of the members of the group is not present in the picture because she was at the doctor's.

loans.use: to buy fruit wholesale.

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
El Sr Carlos Manuel Labora en la empresa de agua potable desde hace 14 años como operador de pozo de agua residuales iniciando sus labores de lunes a sabado.
El Sr. Carlos Manuel ademas de ser trabajador posee un negocio de alquiler de servicios de discomovil la cual necesita comprarle unos parlantes, Consolas y otros equipos, por eso esta solicitando este prestamo a kyva para que le ayude a modernizar su negocio.
texts.en:
Carlos Manuel has worked for 14 years at a water company as a wastewater well operator.  He works Monday through Saturday.

In addition to his employment, Carlos Manuel also rents an outdoor disco service and he needs to buy speakers, consoles and other equipment.  He is requesting a Kiva loan to help modernize his business.

loans.use: To buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Wilder

texts.es:
Wilder es un hombre muy trabajador, tiene una familia maravillosa, su mayor sueño es poder ver a su hijo convertidos en grandes profesionales, es por ello que día a día trabaja con gran entusiasmo en sus cultivos de cacao (se dedica a la agricultura) y fruto de este arduo trabajo es que puede brindar una educación de calidad a su hijo. También está innovando con las plantaciones de maíz y plátano ya que la tierra de su región es excelente para el crecimiento de estos productos.
Wilder quiere obtener una cosecha de calidad en esta temporada es por ello que utilizará el crédito otorgado para realizar el sostenimiento de sus cultivos, él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad, gracias a ello sus ingresos mejorarán y en poco tiempo podrá ampliar sus plantaciones para poder convertirse en un gran empresario.
texts.en: Wilder is a very hard-working man blessed with a great family. His dream is to see his son finish university. This is why he works every day with enthusiasm to tend to his cocoa plants. He is a farmer who wants the best education for his son. He also decided to branch out and start growing sweetcorn and plantain, since the soil in his part of the country is very good for those crops. Wilder wants his cocoa to be of premium quality, which is why he will devote the loan to tending to his plants. He is very grateful to Kiva lenders for their generosity. Thanks to them, his income will increase and he will be able to expand his land and become a great entrepreneur.

loans.use: to tend to his cocoa plants.

loans.name: Francisco Misael

texts.es:
Francisco de 25 años de edad, esta casado y tiene dos hijos. Francisco solo estudio hasta 5º grado, por lo cual no puede obtener un empleo formal; hace 10 años se ha dedicado a la pesca artesanal la cual aprendió de su padre, y trabajo que le permite obtener los ingresos necesarios para los gastos en su hogar. Ádemas de un buen ingreso de alimento muy nutritivo como lo es el pescado.

 Francisco renta una lancha para realizar su pesca y muchas veces madruga o esta toda la noche en el mar pescando, ya que es mucho mejor para obtener una mejor variedad de pescado, Francisco decidió solicitar un préstamo para instalar la luz eléctrica en su casa, comprara algunos focos, conductos y tornillos.

 El sueño de Francisco es tener una lancha propia para mejorar su pesca y obtener mejores ganancias con las cuales piensa mejorar su vivienda y poder darle un futuro mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco, 25, is married and has two children.  He only has a fifth grade education and is unable to get formal employment.  Ten years ago he decided to work in artisan fishing which he learned from his father and which allows him to earn enough income to cover household expenses.  In addition to providing a decent income, fish is a very nutritious food.

Francisco rents a boat and very often goes out to sea early in the morning or all night to fish.  This is the best way to get a variety of fish.  Francisco has decided to request a loan to install electricity in his house and buy lights, wiring and screws.

His dream is to have his own boat and improve his fishing to earn more profit.  He wants to renovate his home and give his family a better future.

loans.use: To install electricity in his home and buy lights, wiring and screws.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
El mundo de los idiomas es lo que le ha llamado la atención a Claudia, es por esta razón que ha decidido estudiar un curso de Call Center. Tiene 38 años de edad, tiene un bebe pero esta soltera. Siempre le ha gustado el idioma ingles y desde pequeña lo ha estudiado es por eso que quiere especializarse aún más para encontrar un buen trabajo en el que pueda desempeñarse. 

Claudia solicita el crédito para cancelar su curso de Call Center. El crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá pagar el curso y lograra obtener un buen trabajo. Dentro de sus planes futuros está estudiar una carrera para convertirse en una profesional de éxito. Su meta próxima es terminar el curso que tomara.
texts.en:
The world of foreign languages is what caught Claudia's attention so she decided to take a Call Center course.  She is 38 years old, single and has a baby.  She always liked English and studied it when she was young so her aim is to specialize even more to find work for herself.

Claudia is requesting a loan to pay for the Call Center course.  The loan will be of great help as she will be able to find a good job when she is finished.  Her plans for the future include studying to get a degree so she can become a successful professional.  Her immediate goal is to finish the course she is taking.

loans.use: To pay for her Call Center course.

loans.name: Cartonera Familiar Group

texts.es:
El grupo Cartonera Familiar está integrado por tres familiares. Doña Juana y Manuel se casaron hace 40 años y tienen cuatro hijos, cada uno de ellos ya tiene su propia familia. Doña Juana, Manuel y Santa se unieron para solicitar un crédito a VisionFund. Desde hace 14 años se han dedicado a elaborar lámina de cartón el cual sirve para techar los corrales de los animales e incluso casas de algunas familias.
Don Manuel platica que cuando era joven trabajaba en una fábrica para elaborar láminas de cartón tras 23 años de experiencia decidió iniciar su propio negocio con sus hijos. La familia recolecta papel y cartón de desperdicio en grandes cantidades, remojan el material en agua, muelen la pasta, crean placas de cartón de 2x2 metros que ponen a secar. Por último, las placas se petrolizan para que tengan mayor durabilidad y se empaquetan para sacarlas al mercado.
Actualmente Manuel no cuenta con un comprador mayoritario y la gran dificultad que enfrenta es el costo de algunos materiales para hacer su producto. Sin embargo, también tiene la gran ventaja de que conoce perfectamente la maquinaria y si llega a tener un problema, él mismo da mantenimiento y arregla el equipo. 
Don Manuel ya es un hombre mayor de edad, pero aún tiene el sueño de innovar su producto, encontrar un nuevo mercado. Ya que necesita comprar nuevos rodillos y una planchadora, utilizará su crédito para estas máquinas. 

*En la imagen: los integrantes posan en la fuente de uno de los municipios del estado donde viven.
texts.en: The group Cartonera Familiar (Family Cardboard) is comprised of three members of the same family. Juana and Manuel have been married for 40 years and have four children, all of whom are adults with their own family. Juana, Manuel, and Santa formed a group to ask VisionFund for a loan. They have been manufacturing cardboard sheets for 14 years. This product is widely used throughout the country, mostly for making roofs for animal pens, but also sometimes for houses. Manuel tells us that he used to work in a factory that made cardboard sheets when he was young. He worked there for 23 years and then decided to start his own business together with his children. The family collect paper and cardboard from refuse in great quantities, then steep it in water, mix the resulting paste, and press it into 2x2 metres cardboad sheets that are put to dry. The last step is to coat them with paraffin in order to make them more resistant. All that is left is then to pack them in order to sell them. Manuel currently does not have a wholesaler that would buy his product in bulk, and the biggest problem he faces is the cost of some of the materials he needs for his product. However, he has an advantage, and that is that he know the machinery inside and out and can therefore perform maintenance and repairs on it himself. Though Manuel might be of respectable age, he still wishes to innovate and find a new market. He needs to buy new rollers and a press, which is why he asks for a loan. In the picture, the members pose in front of the fountain of one of the towns of their state.

loans.use: to buy rollers and a press.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 62 años de edad, está casada, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su esposo, en el municipio de Gracias Lempira. Lleva 15 años dedicándose a su negocio de elaboración y venta de comidas, haciendo variedad como ser tacos, baleadas, tortilla con quesillo, refrescos, licuados, churros, galletas, agua, jugos y otras golosinas. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa donde también atiende a su hogar. Ha solicitado varios prestamos a la institución para mantener activo el negocio, actualmente solicita otro por 25,000 lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en  frutas, verduras, carnes, azúcar, condimentos, harina, manteca, frijoles, arroz, para la elaboración de comidas y  refrescos, churros, dulces, galletas y jugos con el fin de mantener surtido el negocio y obtener los ingresos que necesita. Su sueño es crecer día a día y a futuro convertir el negocio en un restaurante.
texts.en:
Maria, 62, is married and has two children.  She lives with her husband in the town of Gracias Lempira.  She has been preparing and selling food as a business for 15 years.  She makes a variety of different products, such as tacos, tortilla snacks called 'baleadas', tortillas with cheese, soft drinks, fruit shakes, churros, cookies, water, juice and other sweet snacks.  She runs this business from home, while she also takes care of the housework.  

She has asked for various loans from this organization to keep her business going.  She is asking for this current loan of 25,000 lempiras so she can invest in fruit, vegetables, meat, sugar, condiments, flour, butter, frijoles, and rice, so she can make her food, drinks, cakes, cookies and fruit shakes.  This will keep her business well-stocked and allow her to generate the income she needs to get along. 

Her dream is to keep growing and one day convert her home-run business into a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy a variety of food for her stall.

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
A senhora  Lina de 26 anos  de idade é operaria numa empresa do ramo de abate de frangos, mae solteira de 2 filhos dos quais 1 estuda outro ainda menor de idade vive na casa de seus pais sustenta sua mae que vive com ela.
Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia pedra, blocos e legalizar seu espaco.
Tem como projectos e sonhos iniciar a sua obra terminar com os estudos fazer o ensino comercial.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros  e faz xitique como forma de guardar o seu dinheiro, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en: Lina is 26 years old and works on a chicken slaughterhouse.  She is the single mother of 2 children, one who is in school and the other who is still too young to attend. She lives in her parents' house and supports her mother, who lives with her.  She will use this loan to purchase cement, gravel, and concrete blocks, and to legally register her lot.  Her projects and dreams include starting construction, finishing her education, and getting a business degree.  Her main challenges are financial. She uses xitique (traditional community savings method) to save money.  She will request additional loans to put her plans in action.

loans.use: to purchase cement, gravel, and concrete blocks and to legally register her land.

loans.name: Georgina Damaris

texts.es:
Cuando el sol toca la ventana de Georgina sabe que es el comienzo de un nuevo día, muy entusiasta todas las mañanas abre las puertas de su negocio con una sonrisa y con muchas esperanzas de seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes.  Está casada y es madre de un pequeño hijo. Georgina ahora cuenta con un gran negocio surtido de productos, gracias al entusiasmo en la dedicación de su negocio ha podido surtir sus productos, las ventas incrementaron y esto atrajo a nuevos clientes.
Georgina siempre ha sido responsable, es por eso que solicita un crédito para la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón, papel higiénico, todos estos productos son de mucha demanda en su negocio, por eso quiere seguir surtiendo su negocio y de esa manera ampliar sus ganancias y atraer a más clientes. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento del crédito ya que este le ayudara a mejorar su calidad de vida y la economía de su familia, como planes a futuros Georgina espera seguir trabajando con otros financiamientos.
texts.en:
As soon as the sun shines through her window, Georgina knows that it's time to start a new day.  She springs into action every day and throws the doors to her business open.  She receives her customers with a smile and does all she can to continue to satisfy their needs.  

She is married and has a small son.  In her business she sells a wide variety of products and thanks to her enthusiasm and dedication her sales have increased and she has attracted new customers.  

She has always been a responsible person.  She therefore feels that she can ask for a loan to buy rice, sugar, oil, soap, toilet paper, and all the other products that are in such demand in her business.  She would like to continue to stock her store and generate more income by continuing to find more customers.  

She believes in the loan system because it helps her to improve her quality of life and the financial situation of her family.  

She hopes to be able to continue using the loan system in the future.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her store.

loans.name: Jose Mario

texts.es: José, tiene 32 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijos y reside con su familia en una aldea que pertenece al Municipio de Yoro. Tiene 14 años de dedicarse al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, que además recibe otros ingresos por venta de leche y por realizar trabajos de jornal en una hacienda. La producción de granos básicos la vende en la misma zona al igual que la leche y ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 7,000 Lempiras para invertirlos en la compra de insumos, abonos para fertilizar el cultivo de maíz y frijol y en pago de mano de obra. Esta inversión le ayudara a darle mejor asistencia y lograr mayor producción. En el futuro piensa comprar dos vacas para producción de leche.
texts.en:
Jose, 32, lives with his wife and their two children.  They live with his family in a small village in the Yoro area.  

He has been working in agriculture for 14 years, growing corn and frijoles beans.  He also generates an additional income from the sale of milk and labor work which he does on a large estate.  

He sells his basic grains in the same area as his milk.  He has decided to ask for a loan of 7,000 lempiras to buy supplies, manure to fertilize his crops and to pay for labor.  

This investment will help him look after his crops better and improve production.  

In the future he would like to buy two cows to produce milk.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as manure to fertilize his corn and frijoles crops and also to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase beans, onions, oleo, broth, rice, chicken pieces, gizzards, coconut, and sugar.

loans.name: Atalia

texts.pt:
A senhora  Atalia de 48 anos  de idade é operaria agricola, mae solteira de 6 filhos 5 deles ja maiores de idade apenas um a estudar e vive na casa propria.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra para dar continuidadede a sua obra.
Tem como projectos e sonhos  terminar sua obra, deixar a casa actual para seus filhos e passar para a nova.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros  e faz xitique como forma de guardar o seu dinheiro, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en: Atalia is 48 years old and works in agriculture.  She is a single mother of 6 children, 5 of whom are already adults, and one who is in school.  She owns the home where she lives.  With this loan she will purchase cement, sand, and stones to continue construction on her home.  Her projects and dreams are to complete construction, leave her current home for her children and move into the new house.  Her main challenge has been money.  She participates in xitique (traditional savings method) to save money and she will request additional loans to complete her plans.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, and stones.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for his hardware store to strengthen his business.

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.pt:
O Sr. Lazaro de 31 anos de idade casado e pai de 2 filhos  uma esta a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e a outra è menor de idade para frequentar a escola. Ele è colaborador na empresa de producao de banana com cargo de  operario Agricola 
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (cimento, blocos, arros, area, arames, janela, porta e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para iniciar com a construcao da sua casa.
texts.en: Lazaro is 31 years old.  He is married and has 2 children, one of whom is in primary school and the other who is still too young to attend school.  He works for a banana company as an agricultural worker.   With this loan he will purchase construction materials (cement, concrete blocks, sand, wire, windows, doors) and pay for labor to start construction on his house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials (cement, block, sand, wire, windows, doors) and payment for labor.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
A Sra. Ana de 41 anos de idade, viuva  e mae de 3 filhos que estao a frequentar a escola no ensino secundario. Ela è negociante informal de roupas usadas e faz agricultura de sequeira a mais de 10 anos, sua mercadoria vende na porta da sua  casa uma vez qu ela nao possue o estabelicimento comercial.
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar diversas roupas usadas para revender.
Tem como grande desafio melhorar as conndicoes de habitacao e a dieta almentar.
texts.en: Ana is 41 years old.  She is a widow and mother of 3 children who are in secondary school.  She has an informal retail business selling used clothing and has worked in non-irrigated farming for more than 10 years.  She sells her merchandise from the doorstep of her home because she does not have a shop.  With this loan she will purchase a variety of used clothing for resale.  Her biggest challenge is to improve her living conditions and nutrition.

loans.use: to buy used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Nimer Del Carmen

texts.es: Nirme de 32 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con su hijo, su hermana y su cuñado, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de las tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Nirme is 32 years old. She is a single mother and she lives in her own house with her son, her sister and her brother in law. For several years she has made and sold tortillas. Her business is located in her residence and she has a lot of customers. She is asking for a loan to buy lime and quintals of corn to be able to continue making tortillas and be able to improve her income to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy lime and quintals of corn.

loans.name: Maria Celia

texts.es: Maria de 64 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella es una mujer trabajadora, responsable, desde hace varios años se dedica a la  crianza de ganado lechero (producción y venta de leche)  en la zona donde reside. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en: Maria is 64 years old and lives with her life partner in her own home.  She is a hard-working woman, responsible, and for the past several years she has worked raising milking cows (in the production and sale of milk) in the zone where she lives.  She has very good customers since she has known how to gain customer confidence.  She offers quality as well as good prices on her products.  She has decided to invest in the care of her cows since her business depends on that.  For this reason she is requesting a loan in order to purchase vitamins for the cows and to make it possible to purchase a milking cow that will allow her to grow her business.  With the loan she hopes to obtain favorable outcomes and continue bring economic support to her family as long as necessary.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins for her cows and to purchase an additional milking cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes wholesale.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe BENKADI est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 39 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Dioïla, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font la restauration, le commerce de condiments de l’habillement et de fruits et légumes.
Les femmes du groupe BENKADI sont à leur septième prêt solidaire.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à Soro Yiriwaso.
La cliente DJENEBA, première personne de la droite vers la gauche dans le rang des debout est analphabète, elle est actuellement vendeuse de condiments. Elle compte acheter des paniers de tomate, des sacs d’oignon, des cartons de cube Maggi et 1 carton de poisson fumé sur place chez les grossistes.
La vente se fait en détail et en espèce chez elle et au marché à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 90 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Benkadi group is made up of married women, who average 39 years of age with four children each. They all live in traditional families in the town of Dioïla in Dioïla prefecture, which lies in the Koulikoro region (the Republic of Mali's second administrative region). They got to know each other as relatives, neighbors and friends and they practise restauration activities or sell condiments, clothing, fruit and vegetables. 

The women in the Benkadi group are on their seventh group loan; they have turned to Soro Yiriwaso so they can meet their huge customer demand. 

The customer, Djeneba, who is standing on the far right of the photo, is illiterate, and she currently sells condiments. She is planning to buy baskets of tomatoes, sacks of onions, cartons of Maggi stock cubes and a carton of smoked fish from local wholesalers. She sells from her home on a retail basis for cash to a mixed customer base. She expects to make a monthly profit of 90,000FCFA, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe BENKADI est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 33 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Dioïla, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font la restauration, le commerce de l’habillement, de charbon, de lait en poudre et du savon.
Les femmes du groupe BENKADI sont à leur septième prêt solidaire.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à Soro Yiriwaso.
La cliente DJENEBOU, première personne de la droite vers la gauche dans le rang des debout est analphabète, elle est actuellement restauratrice. Elle compte acheter 1 sac de riz, de la farine boulangère, 1 bidon d’huile et des condiments sur place chez les grossistes. 
La vente des plats se fait en espèce au marché à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 50 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Benkadi group is made up of married women, who average 33 years of age with five children each. They all live in traditional families in the town of Dioïla in Dioïla prefecture, which lies in the Koulikoro region (the Republic of Mali's second administrative region). They got to know each other as relatives, neighbors and friends and they practise restauration activities or sell clothing, charcoal, powdered milk and soap. 

The women in the Benkadi group are on their seventh group loan; they have turned to Soro Yiriwaso so they can meet their huge customer demand. 

The customer, Djenebou, who is standing on the far right of the photo, is illiterate, and she currently has a restauration activity. She is planning to buy one sack of rice, flour, a container of oil and condiments from local wholesalers. She sells her dishes at the market for cash to a mixed customer base. She expects to make a monthly profit of 50,000FCFA, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for restauration activity.

loans.name: Milagro Antonia

texts.es: Milagro de 67 años de edad se dedica a la confección de ropa desde hace varios años, con lo que gana de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos del hogar, vive con su compañero de vida en casa propia, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda pero no tiene de suficiente capital, ella solicita un crédito para poder cambiar el techo, repellar las paredes y colocar piso,  y poder comprar arena, cemento, piso cerámico, laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para que puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Milagro is 67 years old. She has made clothes for several years. With what she earns from her work she is able to pay for her household expenses. She lives with her life's companion in her own house. She wants to improve her house but she doesn't have enough capital. She is asking for a loan to be able to change the roof, finish the walls, and put in the floor. She will be able to buy sand, cement, ceramic flooring, sheeting, and beams, as well as to pay for labor costs so they can live more comfortably and safely.

loans.use: to sand, cement, ceramic flooring, sheeting, and beams, as well as to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Djiguisseme Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe DJIGUISSEME est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 47 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Fana, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro (deuxième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de céréales, de condiments, de la galette, de tubercule et de l’encens.
Les femmes du groupe DJIGUISSEME sont à leur onzième prêt solidaire.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à Soro Yiriwaso.
La cliente FATOUMATA, première personne de la droite vers la gauche dans le rang des assises est analphabète, elle est actuellement vendeuse de galette a base de farine. Elle compte acheter 2 sacs de farine boulangère, 1 bidon d’huile, 1 sac de sucre et du sachet plastique sur place chez les grossistes. 
La vente se fait en détail et en espèce au marché à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 60 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Djiguisseme group is made up of married women, who average 47 years of age with four children each. They all live in traditional families in the town of Fana in Dioïla prefecture, which lies in the Koulikoro region (the Republic of Mali's second administrative region). They got to know each other as relatives, neighbors and friends and they sell cereals, condiments, galettes, tubers and incense. 

The women in the Djiguisseme group are on their eleventh group loan; they have turned to Soro Yiriwaso so they can meet their huge customer demand. 

The customer, Fatoumata, who is sitting on the right of the photo, is illiterate, and she currently sells galettes made from flour. She is planning to buy two sacks of flour, a container of oil, a sack of sugar and plastic sachets from local wholesalers. She sells her galettes in the market on a retail basis for cash to a mixed customer base. She expects to make a monthly profit of 60,000FCFA, which will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making galettes.

loans.name: Narinee

texts.en:
Narinee is an artisan in Thailand who specializes in handcrafted silver and marcasite jewelry. She would like to invest in a purchase of raw materials, including sterling silver and marcasite, for her designs.

Narinee has been selling through NOVICA since 2010. This is her story:

"I have a special fascination for marcasite jewelry. The glistening stone allows me to create and design thousands of patterns. My inspiration comes from all that impresses me, like the exotic shape of a flower, the intricate patterns on lace, and small pretty animals. I am not a business woman. Sometimes I don't understand how business works. However, I choose my way to design and sell it. So I need to adjust my thinking and find a way to make art and business get along well. This is quite a challenge for me. I am always happy when I see my finished design and a customer smiling with satisfaction while wearing one of my designs."

"I am short of cash to buy the materials I need to craft my products in time for the holiday season. I am unable to obtain credit through the local shops that I buy from, so the microcredit will really help me. Thank you!"

Use the link below to view Narinee's hand-crafted silver jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/7307

loans.use: to invest in a purchase of raw materials, including sterling silver and marcasite, for her designs.

loans.name: Jose Secundino

texts.es: Jose de 55 años de edad se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y hortalizas, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jose is 55 and has been a farmer for 20 years. He grows sweetcorn and leafy vegetables, and sells the produce at various markets in the vicinity. He lives with his wife and their four children in a house of their own. He asks for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pesticide, and improve his plot of land (shown in the photograph). His aim is to keep on with his work and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies, and tend to his crops.

loans.name: Xiomara Carina

texts.es: Xiomara de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su compañero de vida, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz, chicharron, quesillo, frijoles, tomates y demás ingredientes, para poder continuar con la elaboración de las pupusas y así poder tener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Xiomara is 37 years old and lives in a house of her own with her partner and their two children. She has been making a street food named 'pupusa' for several years. She sells the food from her house and has many customers. She asks for a loan in order to buy sweetcorn, pork rinds, cheese, broad beans, tomatoes, and other ingredients, so as to continue making the food and enjoy better earnings and a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients she needs to cook.

loans.name: Maria Natividad

texts.es: Maria tiene 65 años de edad y vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee desde hace 8 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria is 65 and lives in a house of her own with her family. She has had a small shop at her house for eight years. She has many customers thanks to the affordable prices she offers and her amiability towards customers. She asks for a loan in order to buy soup, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweetbread, etc. Her goal is to increase her income to enjoy a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cosmetics and video game controllers.

loans.name: Los Laureles Group

texts.es: Norma, tiene 21 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene un hijo y reside en una aldea del Municipio de Intibucá. Norma siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura con sus padres, y tiene 4 años de tener su propio cultivo de papas y cultivo de maíz tanto para la venta como para consumo. Este cultivo lo tiene en un terreno agrícola de la comunidad y vende en el mercado local. Ha solicitado un préstamo en forma grupal que es por 11,000 Lempiras para comprar abono, formula, insecticida y cal para darle asistencia al cultivo de papas y de maíz. Su propósito es aumentar la producción para obtener mayor ganancia. El grupo se llama Los Laureles, integrado por 4 personas, quienes se dedican al cultivo de papas y granos básicos y viven en la misma comunidad. El préstamo grupal es por 38,000 lempiras y lo utilizaran en darle asistencia a los cultivos de papas y granos básicos. En la foto se identifica Sonia a la izquierda, Mayra, Norma y María a la derecha.
texts.en: Norma, 21, lives with her husband and their child in a village of Intibucá. She has always been a farmer, a trade she shares with her parents. She has had her own potato and sweetcorn crops for four years. Part of the harvest is for sale, the other part for her own consumption. She grows her produce on a plot of land that belongs to the village and sells it at the local market. She asks for a loan with her group for an amount of 11,000 lempiras in order to buy manure, fertiliser, insecticide, and lime to tend to her crops. Her goal is to increase production so as to earn more money. The group's name is 'Los Laureles' (The Laurels) and it is comprised of four members, who grow potatoes and basic grains and live in the same village. The group loan is for 38,000 lempiras and will be used by members to tend to their crops. In the picture, starting from the left, are Sonia, Mayra, Norma, and María.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to tend to her crops.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo de 55 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ollas, sartenes, hamacas, y demás productos de forma ambulante por los pueblos aledaños, tiene muchos clientes por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, Gerardo vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos nietos, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para continuar con sus venta y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Gerardo, 55 years old, works selling pots, pans, hammocks, and other products as a street vendors in the nearby towns.  He has many customers because of his products' quality and their good prices. Gerardo lives in his own house with his life partner and their two grandchildren. He is asking for a loan to purchase more products in bulk to continue with his sales and to have more income.

loans.use: to purchase pots, pans, hammocks and other products in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Gertrudis

texts.es: Maria de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal desde hace varios años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y también vende de forma ambulantes por las diferentes colonias, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoo, desodorantes etc. todo por mayor y asi poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria, 58 years old, lives in her own house with her family. She has worked selling personal products for a number of years. Her business is located in her home and she also sells them as a street vendor in different colonies. She is asking for a loan to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc., all in bulk, in to be able to continue with her work to have more income.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorant, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jose de 44 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de güisquil, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos en casa propia, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, insecticidas, fungicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Jose, 44 years old, has worked for the past 10 years in agriculture, especially growing güisquil [chayote]. He sells his products in the different markets near his house. He lives with his life partner and their four children in their own house. Jose is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizer, manure, pesticide, insecticide, fungicide, etc. and improve the land that is shown in the photograph, to be able to continue with his work and have more income.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, manure, pesticide, insecticide, fungicide, etc. and improve the land.

loans.name: Edgardo

texts.es: Don Edgardo vive en casa propia con su hija, el se dedica al transporte de carga desde hace 40 años, tiene muchos clientes por la responsabilidad que tiene  a la hora de manejar y  por los precios accesibles, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Don Edgardo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su camión para poder continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Edgardo lives in his own house with his daughter.  He has earned a living transporting cargo for 40 years.  He has a lot of customers because of his responsible driving and affordable prices.  He's able to pay some of his household expenses with what he earns from his job.

Edgardo's requesting a loan to buy tires and provide maintenance on his truck.  That way he can keep on working and earn better profits.

loans.use: to buy tires and to perform maintenance on his truck

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, ceramic flooring and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr: Ayélé âgée de 30ans est mariée avec 01 enfant en charge. Elle est revendeuse de friperies dans une boutique et s'approvisionne à LOME. Son premier crédit lui permettra d'acheter des marchandises afin de satisfaire les besoins des clients. Elle espère vente des balles de friperies et assurer le bien être de la famille.
texts.en:
30-year-old Ayélé is married with one child under her care. She resells used clothing in a shop and gets her supplies from Lome.

Her first credit loan will enable her to buy merchandise to satisfy her customers' needs. She hopes to sell bales of used clothing and ensure the family's well-being.

loans.use: buy used clothing

loans.name: Firuzakhon

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Фирузахон. Она очень милая, добрая, вежливая, гостеприимная жительница города Душанбе-столицы Таджикистана. Фирузахон верная жена и мать двоих детей. Ее муж находиться за приделами страны. Но он часто приезжает в Таджикистан, чтобы навестить семью. Он очень скучает по красавице жене и детям. Ее старшему сыну 15 лет, а младшему 12 лет. Они учатся в средней школе. 
   Фирузахон работает портнихой. Она берет заказы на шитье женских платьев. Ей нравиться ее работа. Фирузахон в этом году окончила Государственный Технологический Университет Таджикистана, по специальности дизайнера. Фирузахон работает портнихой уже 3 года. 
   Причина, по которой Фирузахон обратилась за кредитом, это является покупка битовой техники. Ей не хватает не большой суммы денег, чтобы приобрести бытовую технику дома. Пока не пришли холода, Фирузахон хочет создать все условия и удобства себе и своим детям. На данный момент битовая техника ей является необходимым. Поддержите Фирузахона, она обещает выплачивать кредит в срок, без опозданий.
texts.en:
This is Firuzakhon. She is a very sweet, kind, polite, and courteous resident of the city of Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan. She is a faithful wife and the mother of two children. Her husband works outside of the country but frequently comes back to Tajikistan to visit his family. He misses his beautiful wife and children very much. Their oldest son is 15 and the youngest is 12, and they are both in high school.

Firuzakhon is a dressmaker. She takes orders for women's dresses and she likes her work. This year she graduated from the Tajikistan State Technical University with a degree in design. She has worked as a dressmaker for three years already.

The reason why Firuzakhon requested a loan is to buy household appliances. She has a small sum of money to buy these things for their home. She wants to provide her family with amenities and comfort before it gets cold, so she needs appliances. Firuzakhon promises to repay the loan on time without delay.

loans.use: to buy household appliances

loans.name: Daneth

texts.en:
Daneth is 38 years old, married, and has four children. He lives in Kasese, Uganda. He is a teacher, which he has been doing for 10 years. Daneth was inspired to become a teacher by the love he has for young children. He earns additional income from farming. 

Daneth requested a loan, which he will use to buy bricks to use in constructing his house. He hopes to go for further studies despite the challenges of low payments and being over worked.

loans.use: to purchase bricks to use in constructing his house

loans.name: Aleksander

texts.en:
Alexander is a farmer. On his homestead, he has a cow, pigs, French indoutki (fowl), and broiler chickens. He grows vegetables in greenhouses, providing  him with the main seasonal income. Recently he installed a heating system for his greenhouses. 

In the beginning of autumn, there was a big storm where wind blew off all the plastic film from his greenhouses. Alexander was able to save the harvest in only one greenhouse.

Alexander requested a loan for 40 000 UAH, which he will use to buy new plastic film and fertilizers. He wants to restore the greenhouses and have a good season this year.

loans.use: to purchase plastic film and fertilizers

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is married and is known in the neighborhood area as a hard-working mother. She receives a monthly pension from her retirement. She became a member of PMPC and is actively participating in the various programs and services that the coop offers. 

Anita requested a loan from PMPC for 45,000 PHP, which she will use to to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. She hopes to live comfortably with a decent house.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soup, eggs, soft drinks, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, falvored jellies, molds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace 4 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños, vive con su madre en casa propia, El joven  está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young man whose face is blurred is 29 years old and lives in a high risk area.  He has been engaged in farming for four years, sowing corn and beans, and markets his products in the surrounding villages.  He lives with his mother in his own home.  The young man is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control products, etc. and to improve the land shown in the photograph to enable him to continue his work and have better income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control products, etc. and to improve the land.

loans.name: Medad

texts.es: Medad de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su padre, el se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 10 años, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal y posee muchos clientes, Medad esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más frutas y verduras por mayor para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Medad is 50 years old. He lives in his own house with his father. He has been working selling fruits and vegetables for the past 10 years. His business is located in the municipal market and he has many clients. Medad is requesting a loan to be able to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale to make more revenue.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, plates and covers, etc.

loans.name: Mirian Del Carmen

texts.es: Miriam de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de atoles, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, también adicional a eso vende ropa, con lo que gana de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maicenas de sabores, leche, azúcar, maiz, etc. y ai poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Miriam is 43 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and two children. She works selling atole (hot corn based drinks). Her business is located at her home. She also sells clothing. With what she makes from her work she manages to pay some of the expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy flavored cornflour, milk, sugar, corn, etc. to she can generate more revenue.

loans.use: to buy flavored cornflour, milk, sugar, corn, etc.

loans.name: Geronima

texts.en: Geronima has always dreamed of opening selling rice and corn retail in her home to help sustain the needs of her family.She requested a loan, which she will use to purchase three sacks of rice and three sacks of corn.

loans.use: to purchase three sacks of rice and three sacks of corn

loans.name: Jerson

texts.en:
Jerson is 48 years old, married, and has three children who attend school. He lives in Dumingag, Zamboanga del Sur. Jerson where he has a shop that assembles land tractors, motor cabs, chassis, and trucks. He also repairs any machinery and equipment. Jerson has operated his shop for 22 years and earns approximately 20,000 PHP a month. 

Jerson requested a loan from PMPC, which he will use to purchase additional agricultural materials, equipment, and machinery for his shop. The loan will enable him to produce more tractors and motor cabs to sell and provide quality service to his customers. He will use the profits to sustain his family's needs and support his children's education. In the future, Jerson hopes to expand his shop and employ people to work in his shop so that they can earn and support their own families.

loans.use: to purchase additional agricultural materials, equipment, and machinery for his shop

loans.name: Mawulawoé

texts.fr:
Mawulawoé est une femme âgé(e) de 29 ans. Elle est mariée à comptable. Elle a 02 enfants. Le premier a 05 ans et le dernier a 03 ans.  
Mawulawoé travaille comme revendeuse de condiments depuis un certain moment. Elle vend seule aux clients au marché et s’approvisionne à Lomé.
Mawulawoé a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des condiments. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Mawulawoé voudrait agrandir son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Mawulawoé is a 29-year-old woman who is married to an accountant. She has two children, the oldest of whom is 5 years old and the youngest of whom is 3 years old.
